a1b2c3d4-e5f6-7890-abcd-ef1234567890.title: Add session-capture helper for meaningful memory flushes
a1b2c3d4-e5f6-7890-abcd-ef1234567890.description:
Created session-capture tool that agents can use throughout their work to save context incrementally. Makes memory flushes actually useful by populating the state files flush.sh reads from.
